attributes.action: I think that driving lessons should be available to 16 yr olds or older not 17
attributes.additional_details: Because the amount of freedom it provides young people is extraordinary and enables young people to be much more independent
attributes.background: Change the starting age for learning to drive a car from 17 to 16

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for the same action:

Change the age to get a full car drivers licence to 16 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643332

Lower The Legal Driving Age To 16
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640201
